articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: Hollywood producer Harvey Weinstein in hospital after conviction overturned - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Weinstein’s 2020 rape conviction was recently overturned, but the one-time movie mogul’s troubles are far from over.
articles.content:
Disgraced Hollywood producer Harvey Weinstein has been hospitalised days after his 2020 rape conviction in New York was overturned, his lawyer says.
Weinstein, 72, who remains in jail after being se… [+2507 chars]
